function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with 6g wireless risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"5g technology as a disruptive innovation","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High bandwidth and low latency of 5g enable
